reviewText: It's just low quality gay porn. Letterboxed, so if you have a wide screen, there will be black bars all around and you will have a postage stamp size picture in the middle. Poorly filmed, unprofessional, camera bumps around like a amature home video. Terrible picture quality. If you want porn, you can do much better. NOT recommended.
I truly enjoyed watching this movie. I'm glad I bought it. Sometimes it's a gamble when I buy other G.McDonald movies. 2 were simply awful but this movie was a delight! Buy it!
